mapper.select: SELECT b.THUMBNAIL , b.TITLE , b.AUTHORS , b.PUBLISHER , b.CONTENTS FROM BOOK b JOIN BOOK_DETAIL bd ON b.BOOK_SEQ = bd.BOOK_SEQ WHERE bd.DAMAGE_SEQ = 4
SELECT b.THUMBNAIL , b.TITLE , b.AUTHORS , b.PUBLISHER , b.CONTENTS FROM BOOK b JOIN BOOK_DETAIL bd ON b.BOOK_SEQ = bd.BOOK_SEQ WHERE bd.DAMAGE_SEQ < 4
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK (BOOK_SEQ, THUMBNAIL, TITLE, AUTHORS, PUBLISHER, DATETIME, ISBN, CONTENTS, PRICE, DELFLAG) VALUES(BOOK_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{thumbnail}, #{title}, #{authors}, #{publisher}, #{datetime}, #{isbn}, #{contents}, #{price}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT THUMBNAIL, TITLE, AUTHORS, PUBLISHER, DATETIME, ISBN, CONTENTS, PRICE, DELFLAG , COUNT(TITLE) FROM BOOK WHERE TITLE LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%' AND DELFLAG = 'N' GROUP BY THUMBNAIL, TITLE, AUTHORS, PUBLISHER, DATETIME, ISBN, CONTENTS, PRICE, DELFLAG
